# Aishwarya Narkar

aishwarya narkar real name actress change her name after married to avinash narkar  Latest Filmy News at Lokmat.com |url=https://www.lokmat.com/filmy/photos/marathi-cinema/aishwarya-narkar-real-name-actress-change-her-name-after-married-to-avinash-narkar-a-a971/ |access-date=2025-10-21 |website=LOKMAT |language=mr}}
| birth_date         =
| birth_place        = Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

Aishwarya Narkar (born 8 December 1974) is an Indian actress who has appeared in Marathi films, serials and plays and has also appeared in numerous Hindi serials. She has also appeared in commercials. She also received Maharashtra State Film Award  Best Actress for film ghe bharari and also nominated for Filmfare Award for Best Actress – Marathi.
